page.title: 16 "LIFE" MAGAZINE
page.content: Known as the "Gt. Staughton & Perry {LIFE}Magazine", its aim is to give full coverage to all aspects of life within the local area. It is produced on a voluntary basis once a month by a Magazine Committee. All running costs are met from Advertising Revenue, Annual Subscriptions from sponsoring organisations and Donations. Through this local medium news of people and events in our area can be given, views and ideas expressed and important information - like the list of Associations & Contacts and local Emergency Telephone Numbers - written. The Magazine is distributed, free, to each household and is probably the most effective means of keeping folk in touch with community events. Celebrating its tenth year in 1986, the success of{LIFE}is a tribute to all who work hard for its production.
